definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: the best, only cstr. [[מֵיטַב]] and as superl.; the best of a thing: ´[[שָׂדֵהוּ וּמ]] ´[[מ]] [[כָּרְמוֹ]] Ex 22:4 (JE) the best of his field and the best of his vineyard (choicest fruit); [[הַצּאׁן]] ´[[מ]] the best of the sheep 1Sa 15:9, 1Sa 15:15; [[הָאָרֶץ]] ´[[בְּמ]] in the best of the land Ge 47:6, Ge 47:11 (P).
